verbs.description: [ARG0: Bad dates] [ARGM-TMP: always] [V: have] [ARG1: pits] and Trumpians assumed that their relational progress with North Korea was as easy as talking a customer into buying the extra undercoating on their Hyundai . So the DPRK continues to threaten to cancel the 12 June meetings ...
